page.shortlink: grid component client side afterrowsubmit event
page.description: Fires after the user clicks the submit row button for a Grid Row and the server has processed the request.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: hasErrors
property.description: Indicates whether or not any issues were encountered when saving data to the Grid component's data source. If *[js:true]*, an error occurred. Otherwise, *[js:false]*.

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
